titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish public-private partnerships for the treatment and research of post-traumatic stress disorder.
To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish public-private partnerships for the treatment and research of post-traumatic stress disorder.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs (VA) to enter into agreements with a university, hospital, or other similar entity for the treatment of, and research on, post-traumatic stress disorder.
